Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

Specifications:

Power Output: 14V

Power Consumption: 10.5W

Waterproof Grade: IP65

Power Input: 100-240V, 50/60HZ

Projection Distance: 3-7m / 8.94-22.96ft

Use Scene: Indoor/Outdoor

16 Slides Patterns Mode & 10 Colors Water Wave Mode Create Various Effects for Holiday

16 Holiday Slides Patterns: 5 for Christmas 3 for Halloween 1 for Thanksgiving 1 for Birthday 6 for Celebration

Package Includes:

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

1 * Ground Stake

1 * User Manual

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentine’s Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:12:20 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Modern Solar Spotlights

Solar Lights for Pathway

Solar Spotlights for Pool

Solar Landscape Light for yard

Longer Runtime Solar Outdoor Lights: With advanced monocrystalline silicon solar panels, our solar spotlights outdoor can reach a conversion rate of 21.5%, which is charged for 6-8 hours under the same light intensity, our solar landscape spotlights can convert sunlight into more electricity compared with others. So these solar lights outdoor can stay on for more than 12 hours at night without getting dark.
2 Adjustable Brightness Modes: Our outdoor solar spotlights can be adjusted 2 brightness to suit different scenes. Low Light Mode(12hrs) is suitable for garden, patio or yard. High Light Mode(6hrs) is for walkway, driveway or porch. And these solar lights outdoor can automatically switch by detecting the brightness of the surroundings. Light off at dawn, charge in direct sunlight. Light up at dusk, automatically enter working mode.
IP68 Waterproof Rating Solar Garden Lights: With durable high-impact ABS plastic, our solar landscape spotlights can not only reach IP68 waterproof rating, heat resistant, frost resistant, withstand all kinds of bad weather, but also have a longer service life, reaching 40000+ hours. They are much more durable than other less waterproof grade lights.
2 Installation Options & Quality Assurance: Our solar spotlights outdoor can stick into the ground with stakes, or mount on the wall with the screws included. There are 2 installation methods for you to choose.

Price: $17.99 - $16.57
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:19:53 UTC – Details)


Outsmart the Elements with Rain-X! No other wipers deliver the innovation and technology that is offered by Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency Wiper Blades. These unique blades apply a patented Rain-X water repellent directly onto your windshield for you. The repellent is transferred from the squeegee to the glass – and the magic of Rain-X is activated! Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency Wiper Blades feature advanced beam technology designed to hug your windshield for maximum contact and superior wipe quality. These 2-in-1 wiper blades both clear and repel the elements to provide superior driving visibility. Compared to traditional wiper blades, the difference is amazing! For optimal water repellency activation, run your wiper blades on a clean, dry windshield for 2 minutes. Once activated, the water repelling action will last for months! If you need additional help with determining the right wiper blade size for your car, reference our Blade Finder or Amazon’s Confirmed Fit program. If you need help with installing your new wiper blades, installation videos can be found by scanning the QR code on the back of your wiper blade’s packaging.
Patented Water Repellent Formula – This 2-In-1 Wiper Blade Plus Rain Repellent Applies Patented Rain X Water Repellent Directly To Your Windshield, Both Clearing And Repelling The Elements
Superior Driving Visibility And Safety – Watch Water Magically Bead Up And Roll Off Your Windshield While You Drive, Providing You With Superior All-Weather Driving Visibility, Safety, And Comfort
Easy Installation And Universal Fit – The Rain-X Universal Adapter Is Easy To Use And Fits 96% Of Vehicles. Scan The QR Code On The Back Of The Package For Installation Videos
Advanced Beam Wiper Blade Technology – Provides Uniform Pressure Points Along The Length Of The Blade, Allowing It To Hug The Curvature Of The Windshield For A Smooth, Clean Wipe
Ultimate All-Weather Performance – Designed To Clear Your Windshield In Extreme Weather Conditions, Such As Ice, Snow, And Sleet Delivering Longer-Lasting, Superior Wipe Performance

Read more

Imagine there were wiper blades that did More than just wipe away the rain…

Introducing Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency Wiper Blades. These revolutionary 2-in-1 wiper blades provide an innovative solution to both clear and repel the elements for ultimate driving visibility. In addition to the wipe quality you’ve come to expect from Rain-X, these wipers now also treat your windshield with a water repelling coating so water magically beads up and rolls away while you drive!

Our innovation was Voted one of the #1 by consumers!*

Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency blades work by transferring a Rain-X water repelling coating from the wiper squeegee to the windshield during initial use. The Rain-X water repelling coating will also help clear your windshield of harsh winter weather driving elements, such as ice, snow and sleet. Outsmart the Elements with Rain-X.

*Winner Car Care Category, 2017. Survey of 40,000 people by Kantar TNS.

For Optimal Water Repelling Results:

  • Ensure windshield is clean and dry.
  • Install wiper blades. Remove yellow plastic wiper cover after installation and prior to first use.
  • Turn on the wiper blades and wipe dry at the medium speed for 2 to 3 minutes.
  • Spray washer fluid briefly and water repellency is activated.
  • The water repellency will activate with normal blade use in wet conditions, but requires more time.

Read more

Key Benefits

Experience True Innovation with the 2017 Product of the Year

Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency Wiper Blades apply a Rain-X water repellent coating to your windshield.

Water Repelling Technology

Once activated, the Rain-X water repelling technology applied to the windshield, lasts for months. Watch water magically bead up and roll off your windshield while you drive!

Ultimate Driving Visibility

This 2-IN-1 wiper blade + rain repellent both clear and repel the elements for ultimate driving visibility. Notice the difference in visibility between the glass area treated by the Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency wiper blades vs. the area not reached.

Ease of Installation

The Rain-X universal adapter is easy to use and fits 96% of vehicles. Install at home in minutes! Installation videos are available on the Rain-X Brand Store under Wiper Blades.

Read more


Rain-X Latitude Water Repellency
Rain-X Fusion
Rain-X Weatherbeater
Product Description Rain X Latitude Water Repellency is an innovative 2-in-1 Wiper Blade + Rain Repellent that applies a Rain-X water repellent coating to the windshield Rain X Fusion is the perfect upgrade from traditional wipers; featuring a sleek, heavy-duty exterior casing The original Rain-X Wiper Blade, introduced in 2001. For over 15 years, this traditional wiper blade is still known for its quality and durability

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Description

Water-resistant Compatible with Windows and Mac OS

104 keys US layout keyboard which can prevent damage from spilled drinks or coffee. The designed also keep your keyboard durable and waterproof.”

2-in-1 Keyboard for Gaming or Typing

A keyboard is a must-have tool for anyone who spends many hours typing to do office work every day. So backlit keyboards are designed for the gamer, office worker, copywriter, programmer, typing teacher, and editors.

Lock WIN key to enter game mode

Use FN + WIN keys to turn off the LED keyboard win key to enter the game mode, no longer need to worry about intense game touch win key pop-up start menu bar and lead to screen lag

Friendly Tips

1 Mechanical feel gaming keyboard is not a real mechanical keyboard, but the feel is similar to mechanical keyboard and less noise than mechanical keyboard, suitable for people who need office and game.If you need a real mechanical keyboard, please consider before ordering.

2. The LED of wired backlit keyboard has three colors: red, blue and purple. Press the backlight button to switch between single colors.Due to the differences between versions, if you receive a keyboard without backlit keys, you can use FN+Scroll Look to switch the backlight colour.

We advocate using a simple monochrome keyboard to help you improve your focus in office and gaming. If you need a rainbow breathing keyboard, please consider before ordering.

3.DBpower gaming keyboard product service: 12 months.

4.What’s inside the box? 1*DBpower mechanical feel gaming office 2-in-1 keyboard,1*User’s manual”

【3-Color RGB LED Backlight】Backlit keyboard have 3 Backlight modes providing you immersing gaming experience. Adjustable 23 level brightness meets different needs. You can customize your own backlit keyboard through adjusting the brightness and breathing speed of the backlit. Better enjoy the fun of the game.
【100% Anti-ghosting】Gaming Keyboard made of solid Metal Frame，No fading, more wear-resistant, avoiding the trouble of fading characters.104-key Gaming Keyboard, 19 Non-Conflict Keys, Removable Keycaps, Strengthened Space Key. Specially designed keys for enhanced durability and tactile feedback offers a professional gaming feeling，Give you a greater advantage in the competition.
【12 Function Hotkey Design】Mechanical keyboard features 12 easy-to-reach function keys for multimedia control of video and music, email, and more. Ideal for entertainment, teaching, and office, saving you time and making work and life easier. Convenient and worry-free .This keyboard suitable for families, offices, and travel.
【Ergonomic Design Keyboard 】The design of the pc keyboard accords with ergonomics, is not tired after long-term use, and provides you with the comfort needed for a marathon. The splash-proof feature prevents the internal components of the pc gaming keyboard from being damaged by accidental spills of coffee or water. Effectively prolong the service life, easy to clean.
【Sensitive&Wide Compatibility 】Wired Gaming Keyboard strokes are light and stress-free, and the rebound speed is fast .keyboard combination is very durable and compatible with Windows 2000 / ME / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10. The Wired Keyboard suitable for desktops, Chrome books, PCs, laptops, computers, smart TVs

item.title: Best Pet Supplies 2-in-1 Stuffless Squeaky Dog Toys with Soft, Durable Fabric for Small, Medium, and Large Pets, No Stuffing for Indoor Play, Holds a Plastic Bottle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) THE 2-IN-1 DOG TOY THAT LASTS THROUGH ALL THE FUN Keep them Intrigued It squeaks. It s cute. It s that one dog toy your pup won t want to let go! Our soft, non-stuffed dog toys are designed to tease out the playful side of your pup. It comes ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99 - $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:36:50 UTC – Details)


THE 2-IN-1 DOG TOY THAT LASTS THROUGH ALL THE FUN Keep them Intrigued It squeaks. It s cute. It s that one dog toy your pup won t want to let go! Our soft, non-stuffed dog toys are designed to tease out the playful side of your pup. It comes with one squeaker in the head and another in the tail to make every bite a delight. You can even fit a plastic bottle through the self fastener opening at the bottom to add a crunch that will drive pooch happily wild! Choose between our fun animal designs and treat your dog to a toy that will keep them occupied for ages to come. Designed to Last Does your dog tear apart stuffed plush toys in no time? Well they might have just met their match because these toys have no stuffing to pull out! Our stuffing free toys are perfect for aggressive chewers, and hold up well to countless games of tug & toss. We ve designed them in multiple sizes to suit just about any breed. Whether you have a husky or pug, Labrador or yorkie, you ll find the right dog toy to complement their size and energy. Here s why you ll love these 2 in 1 dog toys: Made using 100% toxin free materials to keep your pup safe. Natural shape and texture sparks your dog s natural instincts. Can be safely washed to quickly remove dirt and odor. Well priced to give you great value for money. Treat your pooch to a dog toy that will keep them fascinatingly engaged for extended play time. Click ‘ Add to Cart now!

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08ZK7MGQJ

KEEP YOUR DOG INTRIGUED: With a squeaker in the head and another in the tail, this stuffing-free dog toy makes every bite a delightfully squeaky treat. These squeaky dog toys also have self fastener at the bottom that you can open up and place a plastic bottle in to introduce a fun crunch into the mix.
CUTE DOG TOY: Our no stuffing dog toys come in fun animal designs. Available in wild duck, fox, raccoon, deer, hare, snow leopard and other styles, these unique dog toys will spark your dog’s natural instincts to hunt and play.
FOR ALL BREEDS: Whether you have a Great Dane or a little Chihuahua, you’ll find the perfect-sized squeaky unstuffed dog toy from our collection. Each of these fun skins come in small, medium and large sizes to fit your dog’s size and age.
GREAT GIFT: Whether you’re looking for an exciting birthday, holiday or a just-because gift for your furbaby, you can’t go wrong with these incredibly fun dog toys. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now!
